user_input: Please create hourly Hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios for Netherlands (NL). Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2040. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now.
